dublin_core.dcvalue: No-Yawa is a national forum for youth to discuss sexual and reproductive health issues through a toll-free hotline and mobile behavior change content. The system sends educational SMS and voice messages and story messages to youth in six local languages.
Caitlin Burton, Business Development Manager, Grameen Foundation, Email: cburton@grameenfoundation.org | Karen Romano, Ghana Country Director, Grameen Foundation, Email: kromano@grameenfoundation.org
Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands
Client education and behavior change communication, Sexual and Reproductive Health
